subject: tearDown not getting called if testXXX throws exception
msgSnippet: I have noticed that tearDown() is NOT getting called (and hence does not cleanup) if one of my tests throws an exception. Is this expected behaviour? C Ya,
messageBody:
I have noticed that tearDown() is NOT getting called (and hence does not cleanup) if one of my tests
throws an exception.

Is this expected behaviour?

C Ya,

Peter McEvoy
Senior Technical Analyst
IONA Technologies
